Variscite marks 20 years of innovation

Variscite, Your Trusted ARM System On Module (SoM) Partner

Always to the highest standard

Over two decades Variscite is developing, producing and manufacturing high-quality System on Modules, consistently setting market benchmarks in terms of reliability, performance, and price. Today Variscite is the leading ARM-based System on Module (SoM) / Computer on Module (CoM) vendor, servicing thousands of satisfied customers worldwide, targeting numerous embedded end products and applications.


Variscite's in-house production facilities are equipped with the most advanced SMT machines, ensuring high-quality Modules and a wide range of configuration choices for every SoM. Our customers benefit from a customized System on Module, fully optimized to the customers specific feature-set, performance and target price.


Variscites full suite of hardware and software solutions supports the customers design process, from the earliest development stages to successful mass production.
